svmapp.tests
Class ROC

java.lang.Object
  svmapp.tests.ROC
public class ROC
extends Object

Carries out ROC tests for LIBSVM and the Bayes classifier for mixture of 2 Gaussians data at a range of Bhattacharya distances.

Author:
Navdeep Singh Daheley

Method Detail

bhattacharya

public double bhattacharya(double[][] mu1,
                           double[][] sigma1,
                           double[][] mu2,
                           double[][] sigma2)
Calculates the Bhattacharya distance of two Gaussian distributions parameterised by their means and covariances.

Parameters:
mu1 - mean vector of distribution 1 in matrix form
mu2 - mean vector of distribution 2 in matrix form
sigma1 - covariance matrix of distribution 1
sigma2 - covariance matrix of distribution 2
Returns:
Bhattacharya distance

compare

public void compare(double m)
Constructs ROC curves for a variety of SVM kernels and the Bayes classifier for the generated data separated by a distance specified.

Parameters:
m - L1 distance separating classes parallel to first dimension

curve

public void curve(int kernel)
Constructs and plots ROC curves for an SVM based on the specified kernel and trained on the generated data.

Parameters:
kernel - kernel to use in training

main

public static void main(String[] args)

plotData

public void plotData(String title)
Plots the generated data using JMathPlot

Parameters:
title - Title of the graph

XYChart

public void XYChart(XYDataset curves,
                    XYDataset solutions,
                    String title)
Plots a series of ROC curves on an XYPlot.

Parameters:
curves - values for the ROC curves
solutions - values for the classifier solutions
title - title of chart
